name: rotki-workspace
description: A portfolio tracking, asset analytics and tax reporting application specializing in Cryptoassets that protects your privacy
author: Rotki Solutions GmbH <info@rotki.com>

scripts.electron:build: npm run build --workspace=@rotki/common && npm run electron:build --workspace rotki
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@rotki/common && npm run build --workspace rotki
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @rotki/common && npm run lint:check -w rotki
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:unit --workspace=rotki && npm run test:integration-ci --workspace=rotki
